connectionPools.name: SampleApp_Lite_Xml
connectionPools.description:
SampleAppLite connection pool to XML datasource. This connection pool points the database to the location where physical XML files are stored. The location uses the value of an RPD variable : BI_EE_HOME.
This variable needs to be correctly set in order for the server to connect to the files.
